newsitem.title: FRANCE: Gascogne buys Cegepac from CDR.
newsitem.headline: Gascogne buys Cegepac from CDR.

text.p: Paper maker Groupe Gascogne said it had agreed with CDR Entreprises to acquire a 96.78 percent stake in Cegepac of France and 100 percent of Embalco in Belgium for an undisclosed sum.
Both companies make packaging machines and had combined 1995 sales of 384 million francs and a net profit of 5.4 million.
CDR is an investment vehicle set-up to sell former Credit Lyonnais assets.
